headline: Why DaVita Stock Got Rocked This Week
summary: Confirming this, veteran healthcare company DaVita (NYSE: DVA) suffered a hacker ambush in recent days, a situation that spooked many investors.  As a result, according to data compiled by S&P Global Market Intelligence, DaVita's stock price fell by 10% over the holiday-shortened trading week.  DaVita disclosed the incident on Monday in a regulatory filing.

headline: DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA): A Case of Limited Growth Potential
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA) on ValueInvestorsClub by Fenkell. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on DVA. The company’s shares were trading at $147.00 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $140.03 on Apr 17. DVA provides kidney dialysis services for patients suffering from […]
